item.title: Setup Blog Using Org Mode and Publish on github pages
item.description: Install hugo https://gohugo.io/installation/ Configurate ox-hugo in emacs config’s file https://ox-hugo.scripter.co/doc/installation/ (use-package ox-hugo :ensure t ;Auto-install the package from Melpa :pin melpa ;`package-archives' should already have ("melpa" . "https://melpa.org/packages/") :after ox) (with-eval-after-load 'ox (require 'ox-hugo)) Use hugo to generate the scaffold 1. Go to home directory and get the blog scaffold cd && hugo new site blog && cd blog 2. Use git submodule to get the theme PaperMod git init git submodule add https://github.
